Unique test document for file upload validation.

This document contains specific information about:
- Company policies for remote work
- Employee benefits including health insurance
- Technical specifications for our API endpoints
- Customer service protocols and escalation procedures

Specific details:
- Remote work policy allows 3 days per week from home
- Health insurance covers 80% of medical costs
- API rate limit is 1000 requests per hour
- Customer service response time target is 2 hours

This content should be uniquely identifiable in RAG responses.
